Key Match Events: India posted a competitive 181/8 against Afghanistan in their first Super 8 match of the 2024 T20 World Cup
Suryakumar Yadav scored a fine half-century
Rashid Khan struck thrice in as many overs to keep India from exploding
Jasprit Bumrah and Arshdeep Singh registered three-fers
India went on to defend their title successfully as they bundled out Afghanistan for 134 runs in 20 overs
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma won the coin toss and decided to bat first
Kuldeep Yadav comes in, replacing Mohammed Siraj
Hazratullah Zazai replaces Karim Janat for Afghanistan
Miscellaneous Highlights: The men in blue went on to defend their title successfully as they bundled out Afghanistan for 134 runs in 20 overs
